data.title: About TiVo
data.text:
What good is a platinum age of TV if viewers can’t find what they want to watch? In a complicated world of too much swiping, scrolling, searching and settling and not nearly enough discovering and delighting, TiVo brings entertainment together.

We make it easy for people to find, watch and enjoy what they love, on their terms. We serve up the best movies, shows, sports and videos from across live TV, on demand, streaming services and countless apps. With TiVo, there’s less searching, more watching in one integrated experience from any screen.

For businesses, we deliver passionate audiences and create new revenue streams everywhere people watch. From studios and networks to pay-TV operators, advertisers and more, our clients and partners benefit from our versatile platform and audience analytics that deepen engagement, drive viewership and reduce churn.

Millions of households and the world's top media and entertainment brands choose TiVo.
